title: WaveSpeed AI - Create Stunning GIFs Effortlessly

hero.heading: Transform Your Moments into GIFs
hero.description: Instantly create animated GIFs from your images with our intuitive tool. Perfect for sharing and capturing memories.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Turn my holiday photos into a fun GIF, create a GIF from a video clip...

examples.heading: Before & After Examples
examples.description: Explore how our tool can turn still images into engaging animated GIFs.

items.title: Image Sequencing
items.imageAlt: Example showing a sequence of images turned into a GIF
items.description: Bring your photos to life with seamless transitions.

items.title: Video to GIF
items.imageAlt: Example showing a video clip turned into a GIF
items.description: Easily convert your favorite clips into shareable animations.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI GIF Maker?
features.description: Our cutting-edge technology makes GIF creation easy and fast.

items.title: Instant Creation
items.description: Generate GIFs in seconds—no lengthy processes, just quick results.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: Create GIFs with just a few clicks. No tech skills needed.

items.title: Secure and Private
items.description: Your images are processed locally, ensuring your privacy is protected.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to create GIFs

items.title: Upload Images or Videos
items.description: Drag and drop your images or paste a video URL. Our tool supports multiple formats.

items.title: Customize GIF Settings
items.description: Adjust frame speed, sequence, and size to get the perfect GIF that fits your needs.

items.title: Download Your GIF
items.description: Preview your animated GIF and download it in seconds—share it with your friends!

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless happy users who create GIFs with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: Creating GIFs has never been easier! I love how fast and fun it is to turn my photos into animations.

items.name: James Wang
items.comment: This tool has greatly improved my social media presence. My followers appreciate the cool GIFs I share.

items.name: Laura Garcia
items.comment: I appreciate the privacy features—my photos stay safe while I create awesome content.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about our GIF Maker

items.title: What formats can I use to create GIFs?
items.description: You can upload JPG, PNG, GIF images, or video formats like MP4 to create your GIFs effortlessly.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many GIFs I can create?
items.description: No limit! Feel free to create as many GIFs as you want, completely free.

items.title: Can I use these GIFs commercially?
items.description: Yes! All users can utilize their created GIFs for personal and commercial purposes without restrictions.

items.title: How does privacy work with the GIF Maker?
items.description: All processing is done in your browser, which means your images are never uploaded to our servers and remain entirely private.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Eye-Catching GIFs?
footer.description: Start using WaveSpeed AI now and unleash your creativity. No sign-up required.
